This feature is provided without a service level agreement, and it's not recommended for production workloads. Certain features might not be supported or might have constrained capabilities. For more information, see [Supplemental Terms of Use for Microsoft Azure Previews](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/)._ **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The audit log allows administrators to review changes made to your site in the past. When you need to debug a problem or maintain track of critical occurrences, such as changes to global rights, this is useful. To read the audit log, you'll need Confluence Administrator permissions. Microsoft Sentinel Solutions provide a consolidated way to acquire Microsoft Sentinel content like data connectors, workbooks, analytics, and automations in your workspace with a single deployment step. **Data Connectors:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for AtlassianConfluenceAudit. You can get AtlassianConfluenceAudit custom log data in your Azure Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery after this Solution deploys. This data connector creates custom log table(s)  in your Azure Sentinel / Azure Log Analytics workspace.
